page.title: 13Farms in Hutton Buscel
page.content:
He keeps sheep, bullocks, and turkeys.
{Jewitts Farm. Mr.Jewitts farm is at the bottom of Dale Hill. He keeps sheep and pigs.He has some land near Sherburn and some in {Hutton Buscel}. He grows corn, root crops ,peas and oil seed rape.He has a shed and a tip up the far lane.
{Robinsons Farm.} Mr.Robinsons farm is at the bottom of Dale Hill. He only keeps sheep. He grows corn and has two tractors. He has a field which people can park their caravans in. {Alandale house farm}is owned by Mr.W.Wood , he employs four farm workers. There are six tractors in use. The animals are bullocks,cows, pigs and sheep. The family have lived there for over three hundred years.
